member.summary: This method will populate the ttResourceCal table using the resource group that was passed in.

member.summary: This method will populate the ttResourceCal table using the resource group that was passed in.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.CheckRGPlant(System.String)
member.summary: This method will verify that the Resource Group ID entered is from the Current plant.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.CustomizeResourceCalRsrc(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},Epicor.Mfg.BO.ResourceGroupDataSet)
member.summary: This method will get a current ResourceCal record or create a temporary ResourceCal record to be modified for a RESOURCE. The ProdHours will be defaulted from the weekday of the selected date. If any changes are made to the ttResourceCal record, the UpdateResourceCal method will have to be called to write the temporary ResourceCal record to the database.
member.param: The selected date to be customized

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.CustomizeResourceCalRsrcGrp(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},Epicor.Mfg.BO.ResourceGroupDataSet)
member.summary: This method will get a current ResourceCal record or create a temporary ResourceCal record to be modified for a RESOURCE GROUP. The ProdHours will be defaulted from the weekday of the selected date. If any changes are made to the ttResourceCal record, the UpdateResourceCal method will have to be called to write the temporary ResourceCal record to the database.
member.param: The selected date to be customized

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.DeleteResourceCal(Epicor.Mfg.BO.ResourceGroupDataSet)
member.summary: This method will delete ResourceCal record.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.InsertNewResource(System.String,System.String,Epicor.Mfg.BO.ResourceGroupDataSet)
member.summary: This method creates a new Resource after prompting for the ResourceID and ResourceGrpID. This is to replace the standard GetNewResource .
member.param: The resourcegrp id value that you are adding this resource to

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.MoveResource(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method creates a new Resource after prompting for the ResourceID and ResourceGrpID. This is to replace the standard GetNewResource .
member.param: The resourcegrp id value that you are moving the resource from.
The resourcegrp id value that you are moving the resource to.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.MoveResourceCal(Epicor.Mfg.BO.ResourceGroupDataSet,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: This method will change SpecialDay of ResourceCal record.
member.param: The original day of the excpetion
The new day the excpetion was moved to

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.SetInactiveFlag(Epicor.Mfg.BO.ResourceGroupDataSet)
member.summary: Call this method when the Inactive Flag on the Resource Group changes and the user answer "Yes" to set the inactive flag on the Resources. All of the Resources Inactive flags will be set to equal to the new inactive setting on the Resource Group.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.UpdateResourceCal(Epicor.Mfg.BO.ResourceGroupDataSet)
member.summary: This method will check to see if the current ttResourceCal record was modified. If it was modified then it compares the capacity from the ttResourceCal the capacity of the production calendar for that day of the week. If they are different, or if it is a special working day or non-working day then it save the ttResourceCal record to the database.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IResourceGroup.ValidateResource(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method validates that the Resource exists and that it isn't assigned to another Resource Group.
member.param: The resource id value to validate.
The resourcegrp id value to validate.
